data.message: IF THIS IS THE REAL MARSHAL MATHERS  let me no i no u do alot of shit but im tryin to make an impact an im 18 an i fell off an i been ta rehab once and i dont want to go back ive been sober an im trying to do my best to prove to my parents i can be something, i am going to go to see a  producer very soon like this week to make my demos an then i will send them wen im done ur kind of my idle right now in my life cuz im trying ta be sober an be somthing i dont want to bother u or piss ur ass off but dr. dre was ur idle from the way ive heard u rap an we are all chasing the same dream. and i am also doin construction to try an save up money to get dj equiptment so i can make my own beats an i can spit game.i have been threw sum ruff ass shit an im on my 6th life an i am on my new life an im startin fresh i hope u will listen ta my story i will send u demos soon please let me no some thing!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
